setupPage.title: Welcome to
setupPage.noPlans: There are no uploaded plans for the moment

helpPage.question: Who you want to perform the action for you?
helpPage.notificationMessage: Once {{name}} has completed your plan you will be notified!

infoPlanModal.title: Information on plan
infoPlanModal.body: Plan is used for gathering together the medicines you need to take during the week with their intake times.

newPlanPage.title: New Plan
newPlanPage.description: Before adding a new medicine provide some useful informations about your daily routine

notification.whatToDo: What would you like to do?
notification.timeToTake: It's time to take your medicine!

personalization.step1Question: When are you more comfortable with moving during the day? (select at least a time slot)
personalization.step2Question: Add a motivation behind the selected slots (optional)

qrScan.instruction: Scan the QR code of the new plan or enter the code manually

medicineDescriptions.fever_and_pain: Treatment for fever, flu-like states and pain of various kinds
medicineDescriptions.headache_menstrual_pain: Analgesic specific for headaches, menstrual pain and neuralgia
medicineDescriptions.joint_muscle_inflammation: Anti-inflammatory for joint, muscle pain and fever states
medicineDescriptions.abdominal_cramps: Relieves abdominal cramps and gastrointestinal tract pain
medicineDescriptions.bacterial_infection: Antibiotic for bacterial infections of respiratory or dental pathways
medicineDescriptions.allergies_antihistamine: Antihistamine for treatment of allergies, rhinitis and urticaria
medicineDescriptions.high_blood_pressure: Antihypertensive drug for blood pressure control
medicineDescriptions.fluid_retention: Diuretic to reduce fluid retention and hypertension
medicineDescriptions.severe_inflammation_asthma: Corticosteroid for severe inflammation, asthma or allergic reactions
medicineDescriptions.antacid_suspension: Oral suspension to relieve acidity and heartburn
medicineDescriptions.dental_throat_pain: Powerful anti-inflammatory for dental pain and throat inflammation
medicineDescriptions.local_pain_relief: Local treatment of joint, muscle and tendon pain
medicineDescriptions.cough_phlegm: Mucolytic to dissolve phlegm in case of heavy cough
medicineDescriptions.intestinal_flora: Probiotic to restore intestinal bacterial flora
medicineDescriptions.anxiety_sleep_disorder: Treatment of anxiety states and sleep disorders
medicineDescriptions.nasal_congestion: Decongestant to clear stuffy nose during cold
medicineDescriptions.skin_infection_eczema: Antibiotic and cortisone ointment for dermatitis and skin infections

updatePage.errorSaving: Error saving data. Please try again.
updatePage.confirmQuestion: Are you sure you want to save?
updatePage.deleteQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} from your plan?
